title: E-Commerce Platform
description: Full-stack e-commerce website built with ASP.NET Core and React. Features include user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, and payment integration.

title: Task Management App
description: Modern task management application with real-time collaboration features. Built with React and Node.js, featuring drag-and-drop interface and team collaboration tools.

title: Brand Identity Design
description: Complete brand identity package including logo design, color palette, typography, and brand guidelines. Created using Adobe Creative Suite.

title: Mobile App UI/UX
description: Modern mobile application interface design with focus on user experience. Includes wireframes, prototypes, and final design mockups.

title: Promotional Video
description: Professional promotional video with motion graphics and sound design. Created for a tech startup using Adobe Premiere Pro and After Effects.

title: Database Management System
description: Custom database management system for inventory tracking. Built with C# and SQL Server, featuring advanced reporting and analytics.
